SENT.plain: Thoracoscopically assisted esophagectomy with gastric pull-up was done in a 56-year-old man with esophageal cancer
The thoracoscopic technique, including the use of intraoperative ultrasound, is discussed
The addition of thoracoscopy offers safer and more complete esophageal dissection than transhiatal blunt esophagectomy and is less invasive than conventional thoracotomy
